Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the resource name.

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: The resource id for the DB cluster. For example: cluster-ABCD1234EFGH5678IJKL90MNOP.  The cluster ID uniquely identifies the cluster and is used in things like IAM authentication policies.
The connection endpoint for the DB cluster. For example: mystack-mydbcluster-1apw1j4phylrk.cg034hpkmmjt.us-east-2.rds.amazonaws.com
The port number on which the DB instances in the DB cluster accept connections.
The reader endpoint for the DB cluster. For example: mystack-mydbcluster-ro-1apw1j4phylrk.cg034hpkmmjt.us-east-2.rds.amazonaws.com
